properties.name: app.guesty.client-id
properties.description: Client ID to authenticate against Guesty

properties.name: app.guesty.client-secret
properties.description: Client secret to authenticate against Guesty

properties.name: app.guesty.sandbox
properties.description: A boolean stating if the application is meant to run on sandbox mode

properties.name: app.guesty.url
properties.description: Base URL to make requests to GUESTY API
